## ‚öô Install

<details>
<summary>
<span style="color: deepskyblue; "><b>Packages Manifest</b></span>
</summary>

````json
{
  "dependencies": {
    "com.aio.package": "latest"
  },
  "scopedRegistries": [
    {
      "name": "package.openupm.com",
      "url": "https://package.openupm.com",
      "scopes": [
        "com.aio.package"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
````

</details>

<details>
<summary>
<span style="color: deepskyblue; "><b>Unity PackageManager</b></span>
</summary>

> open upm *Chinese Version*

~~~
Name: package.openupm.cn
URL: https://package.openupm.cn
Scope(s): com.aio.package
~~~

> open upm *International Version*

~~~
Name: package.openupm.com
URL: https://package.openupm.com
Scope(s): com.aio.package
~~~

</details>

<details>
<summary>
<span style="color: deepskyblue; "><b>Command Line</b></span>
</summary>

> open *upm-cli*

~~~
openupm add com.aio.package
~~~

</details>

## ‚≠ê About

- **This is a Unity general API tool function call package.** It provides a set of function call tools to help developers quickly build projects.
- ‚úÖ **Support Unity 2019.4 and above**
- ‚úÖ **Support Android/iOS/Windows/Mac/WebGL**
- ‚úÖ **Support .NET 4.x and .NET Standard 2.0**

For more info please see | [Documentation](./README.md)
or [Wiki](https://github.com/AIO-GAME/Common/wiki)

| Doc                                                                       | Description                                 |
|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------|:--------------------------------------------|
| [ü™ûÔ∏è -> **_AHelper_**](https://github.com/AIO-GAME/Common/wiki/AHelper)   | <i>C# .net core General Basis Function</i>  |
| [ü™û -> **_EHelper_**](https://github.com/AIO-GAME/Common/wiki/EHepler)    | <i>Unity Editor General Basis Function</i>  |
| [ü™û -> **_RHelper_**](https://github.com/AIO-GAME/Common/wiki/RHelper)    | <i>Unity Runtime General Basis Function</i> |
| [ü™û -> **_Print_**](https://github.com/AIO-GAME/Common/wiki/Print)        | <i>.net core or Unity Output Log</i>        |
| [ü™û -> **_Ensure_**](https://github.com/AIO-GAME/Common/wiki/Ensure)      | <i>All Platform Check Exception</i>         |
